Hey, I'm Tom. I'm a Data Scientist living in Philly.

About me
I am currently working as a Data Scientist at Deloitte, which is where my passion for working with data and experience solving business problems converge. Outside of work I love to travel and get a taste of different cultures. In addition to working, I am also pursuing my Masters in Analytics through Georgia Tech. Currently, I'm starting my own freelancing work through my network and websites like Upwork and Fiverr. If you have a project in mind that you need help with, or even if you'd just like to connect, please reach out!
Let's Work Together
